name: park-ball
effect: Used by a trainer in battle : Catches a wild Pokémon. This item can only be used in pal park.
short_effect: Catches Pokémon in the Pal Park every time.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.
